Question.Question 1: What is the best way to handle conflicts in the workplace?
Question.asnwer_1: Avoid the person you have a conflict with
Question.asnwer_2: Address the conflict objectively and talk to the person involved
Question.asnwer_3: Talk to other colleagues about the conflict
Question.asnwer_4: Ignore the conflict and wait for it to resolve itself
Question.correct_answer: Address the conflict objectively and talk to the person involved

Question.Question 2: What is a key element of teamwork?
Question.asnwer_3: Relying on others to get the work done
Question.asnwer_4: Focusing only on your personal tasks

Question.Question 3: What is the best way to improve active listening skills?
Question.asnwer_1: Thinking about what you will say after the person finishes talking
Question.asnwer_2: Pretending to listen and giving non-substantive feedback
Question.asnwer_3: Interrupting the speaker when you feel bored
Question.asnwer_4: Paying full attention to the speaker and providing meaningful feedback
Question.correct_answer: Paying full attention to the speaker and providing meaningful feedback

Question.Question 4: How can you manage your time effectively?
Question.asnwer_1: Doing the most difficult tasks first
Question.asnwer_2: Procrastinating on tasks until the last minute
Question.asnwer_3: Working on multiple tasks at the same time
Question.asnwer_4: Focusing on small, unimportant tasks first
Question.correct_answer: Doing the most difficult tasks first

Question.Question 5: What is the best way to deal with stress at work?
Question.asnwer_1: Ignore the stress and hope it goes away
Question.asnwer_2: Take regular breaks and practice relaxation techniques
Question.asnwer_3: Work longer hours to get everything done
Question.asnwer_4: Complain to colleagues about your workload
Question.correct_answer: Take regular breaks and practice relaxation techniques

Question.Question 2: How do you handle tight deadlines?
Question.asnwer_1: I ignore the deadlines and work at my own pace
Question.asnwer_2: I prioritize my tasks and focus on completing the most important ones first
Question.asnwer_3: I delegate all my work to others
Question.asnwer_4: I avoid taking any breaks until the work is done
Question.correct_answer: I prioritize my tasks and focus on completing the most important ones first
